input:
The software is designed to take a paragraph of text as input and format it into HTML with specific tagging requirements 
Input component: text - a paragraph of text
Syntax constraint: the input must be a string of characters
Semantic constraint: the input must be a coherent paragraph of text
Test case 1: 
text: The sun was shining brightly in the clear blue sky. The birds were singing their sweet melodies. The flowers were blooming with vibrant colors.
output:
The sun was shining brightly in the clear blue sky.

The birds were singing their sweet melodies.

The flowers were blooming with vibrant colors.
complianceText:
The chatbot output has at least three

tags, which complies with the description. Each

tag contains one tag and multiple tags to emphasize key words and phrases, also complying with the description. The structure of the sentences is not evaluated as it requires knowing the input. Since all rules that do not require knowledge of the input are followed, there is no violation. OK
